info.title: Sage Accounting API - Taxes
info.description: Documentation of the Sage Business Cloud Accounting API.

contact.name: Sage Business Cloud Accounting API Team

tags.name: Draft Tax Returns
tags.description: This endpoint provides detailed information about draft tax returns and allows for their creation and deletion.

tags.name: Tax Determinations
tags.description: Tax Determination Engine provides an API that given information about an artefact, the business generating the artefact, and the customer of the artefact, provides a set of legislatively valid VAT rates describing the percentage that should be applied per item.

tags.name: Tax Profiles
tags.description: This endpoint holds details about the current business' VAT taxation.

tags.name: Tax Rates
tags.description: A tax rate as in this endpoint's resource is a VAT tax rate in the current business' country. In the US and CA, tax rates are combined and have two percentages that add up.

tags.name: Tax Return Frequencies
tags.description: This endpoint is used to dynamically know your options what to specify as `tax_return_frequency` when POSTing to `/tax_profiles`.

tags.name: Tax Schemes
tags.description: A tax scheme is different from a tax rate in that it lacks a percentage and a country reference. You can think of it as VAT-taxation type. Chances are that you will never need it; in the API tax schemes only occur in the `financial_settings` endpoint's response.

tags.name: Tax Types
tags.description: This resource is more precisely described as 'types to do a (VAT) tax return'. In some countries there are different ways to report taxes, and this endpoint is about them. You will only need this to filter `/tax_profiles` or to know which values to expect in the `tax_type` property of its response.

parameters.description: Specify the attributes that you want to expose for the Tax Type (expose all attributes with 'all'). These are in addition to the base attributes (name, path)

id.description: The unique identifier for the item

displayed_as.description: Display text for the item, includes the period the tax return covers.

$path.description: The API path for the resource

created_at.description: The datetime when the item was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the item was last updated

period_start_date.description: The tax return from date. This is the start date of the period the tax return covers.

period_end_date.description: The tax return to date. This is the end date of the period the tax return covers.

submitted_date.description: Date when the tax return was submitted

id.description: The unique identifier for the item

$path.description: The API path for the resource

created_at.description: The datetime when the item was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the item was last updated

name.description: The name of the tax rate

percentages.description: The tax rate percentage and date ranges they apply to

is_visible.description: Indicates whether the tax rate is displayed in the application

retailer.description: Indicates if tax rate is a retailer rate or not

editable.description: Indicates whether a tax rate can be edited

deletable.description: Indicates whether a tax rate can be deleted

is_combined_rate.description: Indicates whether the tax rate is made up of component tax rates

component_tax_rates.description: The component tax rates which make up a combined rate

id.description: The unique identifier for the item

displayed_as.description: Display text for the item, includes the period the tax return covers.

$path.description: The API path for the resource

created_at.description: The datetime when the item was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the item was last updated

period_start_date.description: The tax return from date. This is the start date of the period the tax return covers.

period_end_date.description: The tax return to date. This is the end date of the period the tax return covers.

start_date.description: The start date of this obligation period.

end_date.description: The end date of this obligation period.

due_date.description: The due date for this obligation period.

received_date.description: The obligation received date, is returned when status is (F = Fulfilled).

hmrc_status.description: Which obligation statuses to return (O = Open, F = Fulfilled)

period_key.description: The ID code for the period that this obligation belongs to.The format is four alphanumeric characters. Occasionally the format includes the # symbol.

status.description: The status of the obligation period, nil unless the period is already used in a VAT returnThe status is one of the following: Draft, Submitted, Submission Failed, Queued, Waiting

$path.description: The API path for the resource
